alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 7:28PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Mower and northwestern Fillmore Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 726 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms with public reports of landspouts along a line extending from near Fountain to near Grand Meadow. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spring Valley, Grand Meadow, Wykoff, Fillmore, Washington, Carimona, Highways 63 And 16 and Hamilton. LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in La Crosse. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Minnesota.
